movie.title: The Truth of Our Marriage
movie.description_intro: Francois Donge, a wealthy manufacturer, is fighting death at hospital. He officially suffers from a food poisoning. But actually, his wife Bebe deliberately poisoned him. Flashback: ten years before, Francois meets Bebe. He is already wealthy, and has many affairs. She is an idealistic young woman. He is thinking of taking a wife, she is looking for love...
movie.description_full: Francois Donge, a wealthy manufacturer, is fighting death at hospital. He officially suffers from a food poisoning. But actually, his wife Bebe deliberately poisoned him. Flashback: ten years before, Francois meets Bebe. He is already wealthy, and has many affairs. She is an idealistic young woman. He is thinking of taking a wife, she is looking for love...

movies.title: Two Night Stand
movies.summary: After an extremely regrettable one night stand, two strangers wake up to find themselves snowed in after sleeping through a blizzard that put all of Manhattan on ice. They're now trapped together in a tiny apartment, forced to get to know each other way more than any one night stand should.

movies.title: Whose Streets?
movies.summary: An unflinching look at how the police killing of 18-year-old Mike Brown inspired a community to fight back and sparked a global movement.
movies.description_full: An unflinching look at how the police killing of 18-year-old Mike Brown inspired a community to fight back and sparked a global movement.
movies.synopsis: An unflinching look at how the police killing of 18-year-old Mike Brown inspired a community to fight back and sparked a global movement.

movies.title: Leprechaun: Origins
movies.summary: Backpacking through the lush Irish countryside, two unsuspecting young couples discover a town's chilling secret. Ben (Dunbar), Sophie (Bennet), David (Fletcher) and Jeni (Roxburgh) quickly discover the idyllic land is not what it appears to be when the town's residents offer the hikers an old cabin at the edge of the woods. Soon, the friends will find that one of Ireland's most famous legends is a terrifying reality.

movies.title: Heneral Luna
movies.summary: Set during the Philippine-American war, Heneral Luna follows the life of one of Philippine History's most brilliant soldier, General Antonio Luna, as he tries to lead his countrymen against colonial masters new and old, and to rise above their own raging disputes to fulfill the promise of the Philippine Revolution.
